# Browser dApps and web

## Network's Name <a href="#network-s-name" id="network-s-name"></a>

There is a tag shown before the node's name and network status which displays the network

* **MAIN** / **TEST** / **SOLO** / **UNKNOWN**

> TIP
>
> * SOLO is standalone mode
> * UNKNOWN is a network which is not official listed

## Network Status <a href="#network-status" id="network-status"></a>

There are three colors show the network status :

1. Green <img src="../../../../.gitbook/assets/download (5).png" alt="" data-size="line">: The node is synced
2. Orange <img src="../../../../.gitbook/assets/download (6).png" alt="" data-size="line"> : The node is syncing
3. Red <img src="../../../../.gitbook/assets/download (7).png" alt="" data-size="line"> : The node is out of sync

### Connect to a Node <a href="#connect-to-a-node" id="connect-to-a-node"></a>

1.  Click on the network, at left of the address bar(it is shown the network MAIN/TEST/SOLO/UNKNOWN)

    <figure><img src="../../../../.gitbook/assets/address-bar.a15ff370.png" alt=""><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
2. Select the node you would like to connect

For more information about node management, please visit [here](settings.md#node-management)

### Go to dApps or Websites <a href="#go-to-dapps-or-websites" id="go-to-dapps-or-websites"></a>

1.  At the top center, input the website/dApps name or URL in the address bar

    <figure><img src="../../../../.gitbook/assets/address-bar.a15ff370.png" alt=""><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
2. Pick a suggestions/recently visited, or press Return/Enter to go directly to the address you typed.

### Open New Tab <a href="#open-new-tab" id="open-new-tab"></a>

At the top of the window, next to the last tab on the right, click <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line"> to open new tab

### Shortcuts <a href="#shortcuts" id="shortcuts"></a>

* Add new shortcut
  1. At right of the address bar , Click <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line">
  2. Click <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line">**Add shortcut**" to confirm.If you want to dismiss the action, you can click anywhere to cancel the action
* Remove shortcut
  1. In dApp/website
     1. At right of the address bar , Click <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line">
     2. Click <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line">**Remove shortcut**" to confirm.If you want to cancel, you can click anywhere to cancel the action
  2. In homepage
     1. Move-over your pointer to the shortcut which you want to remove and wait for a second.
     2. Click the <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line"> at top right
     3. Click **REMOVE**
* Edit shortcut's name
  1. Move-over your pointer to the shortcut which you want to edit
  2. Click the <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line"> at top right
  3. Input the name which you would like to name the shortcut
  4. Click **SAVE** to finish the editing.
